html:
Authorization To Use And Disclose Protected Health Information [cite: 1734]

I authorize the mutual exchange of information between Trillium Community Health Plan, Just Compassion of East Washington County and the persons/entities listed in Section 2. [cite: 1735]

1. Name Of Individual Whose Information Is To Be Disclosed [cite: 1740]

Name of Insured/Member: {{ doc.first_name }} {{ doc.last_name }}
Date of Birth: {{ doc.date_of_birth }}
Address: {{ doc.current_mailing_address }}
Daytime Telephone: {{ doc.phone }}
Member ID Number: {{ doc.ohp_number }}

2. Persons/Entities Authorized To Receive Personal Health Information [cite: 1742]

All staff, representatives, and authorized agents of: [cite: 1743]

  • Just Compassion of East Washington County, and [cite: 1744]
  • Trillium Community Health Plan, and any subcontracted or affiliated program staff... [cite: 1745]

3. Type Of Information To Be Released And Its Use [cite: 1746]

I permit to release and receive... personal health information... for the purpose of care coordination, housing support, etc: [cite: 1747]

  • Housing history and homelessness verification... [cite: 1749]
  • Rent payment history and lease information [cite: 1750]

4. Sensitive Information – Special Authorization Required [cite: 1757]

Please initial any categories you agree to release: [cite: 1758]

{% if doc.custom_trillium_i_agree_to_release_mental_health_info %} [X] {% else %} [ ] {% endif %} Mental health/psychiatric care information
{% if doc.custom_trillium_i_agree_to_release_drugalcohol_info %} [X] {% else %} [ ] {% endif %} Drug/alcohol diagnosis, treatment, and referral information

8. Signature [cite: 1775]

Signature of Individual:
{% if doc.participant_signature %} {% endif %}
Printed Name: {{ doc.first_name }} {{ doc.last_name }} [cite: 1777]
Date: {{ doc.certification_date }} [cite: 1776]

html:
Self-Certification of Zero Income

Just Compassion of East Washington County

"Be seen, be heard, be known; building bridges to wholeness"

Purpose

This Self-Certification of Zero Income form helps document a participant's financial status, ensuring clarity and verification for both the participant and the agency.

Participant Information

Full Name: {{ doc.first_name }} {{ doc.last_name }} Date of Birth: {{ doc.get_formatted("date_of_birth") }}
Phone Number: {{ doc.phone }} Current Mailing Address: {{ doc.current_mailing_address }}
Caseworker/Staff Contact: {{ doc.get_formatted("caseworker") }}

Income Status

I, {{ doc.first_name }} {{ doc.last_name }}, certify that I currently have no income from any source. I understand that this self-certification may be used to determine eligibility for services and assistance. I certify that I have received no income from the following sources in the last 30 days:

☐ Employment (Wages) ☐ SSD/I ☐ Disability Benefits
☐ Self-Employment ☐ TANF ☐ Child Support
☐ Social Security Benefits ☐ Unemployment Benefits ☐ Foster care
☐ Armed forces ☐ Pension/retirement ☐ Alimony
☐ Rental Income (in last 24 months)
☐ Other (please specify): _________

Description of Current Financial Situation

(Please provide a brief description of your current financial situation...)

{{ doc.custom_financial_situation }}

Certification

I certify that the information provided above is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that providing false or misleading information may result in the denial of services or other legal consequences.

Participant Signature:
{% if doc.participant_signature %} {% endif %}
Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("certification_date") }}

For Staff Use Only

Staff Member Name: ________________________

Position/Title: _____________________________

Date of Intake/Certification: __________________

Program Enrolled: _____________________________
name: Zero Income Affidavit
